title: Gucci’s Summer Soirée Heralds A Return To Normal
cleaned_text: “More, More, More!” Mark Ronson funked up the Andrea True disco staple as the likes of Drew Barrymore, Grace Gummer (Ronson’s fiancée) and a swarm of stylists and Hamptons scenesters shook their Gucci-clad derrieres on the outdoor dance floor. How do you like it? More prints! More projections (on the Richard Meier-designed home)! More pizza (from Amber Waves, whose wood-burning oven kept churning it out)! Gucci celebrated the return to social life, and its new East Hampton outpost, with the party of the season—so far—on the sprawling grounds of stylist Elizabeth Saltzman’s iconic south of the highway estate. An impossibly chic and refreshingly diverse crowd rocked Alessandro Michele’s sexy, colorful creations (which can now be purchased in Gucci’s Newtown Lane storefront), as all savored the joys of living life to the fullest again, strawberry margarita in hand and vaccination card in pocket.

opengraph.title: Gucci’s Summer Soirée Heralds A Return To Normal - The Purist
